```{r}
#extreme_heat
extr_heat_df <- as.data.frame(extr_heat, xy = TRUE) |>
  filter(LST_Day_1km != 0) 

#2030-2064
```

prelim plot
```{r}
#LST_Day_1km
#tasmax_median
hotdays<- 
  ggplot()+
  geom_raster(data = extr_heat_df, aes(x = x, y = y, fill = LST_Day_1km))+
  geom_sf(data = state_shp, aes(geometry = geometry), fill= NA, color = "white", size = 20,  show.legend = F)+
  geom_point(data = cities, aes(x = x, y = y), color = "yellow", size = 3,  show.legend = F) +
  scale_fill_viridis(option="A") +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")+
  guides(fill = guide_colorbar("Frequency of hot days 2012-2022"))+
  theme(legend.position = c(0.8, 0.2),  # Custom position (x, y)
        legend.justification = c(2.4, 0),
        legend.direction = "horizontal")   # Anchor point (right, bottom)
```

```{r}
ggsave(hotdays,
       file="~/Documents/extreme_heat_cc/results/extreme_heat.tiff",
       width = 12,height = 10,
       dpi=600)
```
